name: Close Encounters of the Word Kind
name_original: Close Encounters of the Word Kind
description:
My entry for the Ludum Dare #32 48-hour game jam.

Close Encounters of the Word Kind is a little game about resisting an alien invasion using words as your weapon. UFOs appear with three letter clues. For each UFO, you must find a word that contains these letters at the start, middle and end respectively.
